name: Mother Russia Bleeds
plot: An old-fashioned beat 'em up with big doses of adrenaline and trippiness. Set in a cold, ruthless Soviet Union, Mother Russia Bleeds aims to conjure up anxiety.

name: Pokémon Ruby Version
plot: In the third generation of Pokemon games, the player roams the Hoenn region of the Pokemon world in hopes of catching all 350+ species of Pokemon and becoming a Pokemon Master.

name: Pokémon Colosseum
plot: You play as Wes in this Pokemon RPG for the Nintendo Gamecube where you must rescue Shadow Pokemon.
